text:
Thank you NC for closing out a loaded show week with a bang! 🔥 🧬 #DNAWorldTour 

📸: @Dr_Dude https://t.co/cvgJgoRAGX

WOW! Always amazing coming back to where it all started. We had an incredible 3️⃣ nights with you Florida! 🧬 #DNAWorldTour 

📸: @Dr_Dude https://t.co/oXK5mrH0eB

Absolutely incredible to hear that over 45 million people tuned into the livestream we did with @WeChatApp. Huge thank you to all of our amazing fans in China for making this happen! We can’t wait to come see you all in person real soon! 🖤 https://t.co/6TbEt6Koqi

ATTN: ALPHARETTA, GA! Want to hang with Brian & his son Baylee after the #DNAWorldTour show on 6/28? 🧬 Get ready for their VIP After Party with a father/son live performance and M&G at https://t.co/eotupFFy5C https://t.co/BoXA54YXrk
IT’S SUMMER TIME BABY ☀️ To celebrate the Summer Solstice, all purchases $35+ come with a free BSB frisbee, today through June 24! Shop here: https://t.co/ttfjRSaVYG https://t.co/aBJtxpYRpE
Happy Father’s Day, Backstreet Dads 🖤 https://t.co/ETV0m69ylO

Thank you, thank you, THANK YOU for your hospitality Texas! 3 Nights will never be long enough. #DNAWorldTour 🧬 🧬

📸: @Dr_Dude https://t.co/xg8MHYXbWD

2 nights down in TX, 1 to go! #DNAWorldTour 🧬

📸: @Dr_Dude https://t.co/Lt6xFHivcs
The #DNAWorldTour has us feeling LARGER THAN LIFE so far 🖤🧬 See you soon, TX! https://t.co/sKi2cu7Wlb

Phoenix! We missed you and love you so much. Thanks for throwing a great party. Next up: New Mexico 🧬 #DNAWorldTour

📸: @Dr_Dude https://t.co/lGtC7a5S7O

The Hollywood Bowl show last night is one we will never forget. There were too many special moments to count - but one of them was having our little Backstreet family out on stage with us. Thank you to each and every one of you for making it magic 🖤🧬 #DNAWorldTour

📸: @Dr_Dude https://t.co/DNzFbAZ5ov
These lovely ladies just got upgraded to the front! See you all soon 🖤 #BSBUpgradeMe #DNAWorldTour https://t.co/msNRPPunNW
…and we’re back baby!! Wow! What a feeling! #DNAWorldTour 🖤 🧬 https://t.co/aDre4ZN2fK
Now THAT’S the way we like it! Thanks for helping us kick off the #DNAWorldTour2022 you guys!! https://t.co/W4gynSF5of

SURPRISE!!! If the #DNAWorldTour2022 starting tomorrow wasn’t exciting enough.. we’re PUMPED to announce that @DeltaGoodrem will be joining us on tour this Summer. LET’S GOOO! 🖤🧬🖤🧬 https://t.co/NfDr0HCjhv
Kick off the #DNAWorldTour2022 with some new threads! Show up to a show in style 😎. On sale now at https://t.co/XKsXFdzTfm https://t.co/7Y2h2CSn7D
T-3 DAYS ‘till we kick off the #DNAWorldTour2022 in San Diego! 🧬 Our heartbeats are rising… https://t.co/KRgnAIFtut
We hope everyone had a relaxing & retrospective Memorial Day Weekend! Next up: #DNAWorldTour2022! 🖤 https://t.co/VAOsxE8GjI
🚨Incoming MDW sale! Take a 20% off BSB merch this weekend only at https://t.co/TsN9dB8lR0! https://t.co/pkNpCfrhIx
TICKETS TO OUR NEWLY ADDED #DNAWORLDTOUR SHOWS IN BRAZIL ARE ON SALE NOW!  🇧🇷 https://t.co/QaPPK55Kqm https://t.co/EflI7oakX1
@bookstarsky See you soon 🖤

BRAZIL! 🇧🇷 We’re headed your way in January for the #DNAWorldTour 🧬. Fan club pre-sale tickets go on sale tomorrow, Tuesday May 24 at 10am local. General on sale starts Friday May 27th at 10 am local. SEE YOU THERE! 💚💛💙 https://t.co/67Kwplocbx https://t.co/cvYHyXbGSW

Today we celebrate one of our biggest achievements… the release of our Millennium! We thank each of you who’ve been listening to the album for 23 years! So thankful it’s become part of our history. Let’s celebrate by listening to Millennium today! https://t.co/A5mHQmt023 https://t.co/59OiQTR8DI

Everybody brought the party to Mexico City this weekend! Thank you @TecateEmblema for having us! Performing this weekend made us even more excited to kickoff the #DNAWorldTour2022! 🧬🖤 https://t.co/114gdQd80S
TONIGHT! Can’t wait to get back on stage and perform for you all! Who are we seeing at the @TecateEmblema Festival tonight?! https://t.co/vH5pIkipow

3 years ago today, the DNA World Tour officially began…and we can’t wait to finally get back to it!! #DNAWorldTour let’s do this!! 🧬🖤 Let us know which shows you’re coming to down below! 👇🏻 https://t.co/Ud4xIfA8dt

🚨MORE DATES ADDED! Paris, Manchester, & Antwerp - we’re headed your way this Fall! Backstreet Army pre-sale tickets go on sale May 11 at 10am local. General on sale starts May 13 at 10am local. Can’t wait to see even more of you #DNAWorldTour2022 🧬🖤 https://t.co/pCFjdlLVgx https://t.co/c85ejLoXgJ
Heading down south like… We’re heading down to Mexico City for the @TecateEmblema Festival this weekend! You guys comin’ along? https://t.co/n1XhObEk8a
Wishing a very Happy Mother’s Day to our baby mommas and all the incredible moms in the Backstreet Army! https://t.co/u9pqsiK2vJ

Treat your mommas right this Mother’s Day with some new BSB merch this weekend. Orders of $50 or more come with a free pair of slippers! Head on over to https://t.co/cDR9VY0FtO for more details! 🌸🖤 https://t.co/lJa3AxVHAu
🚨 VIP upgrades for the North American dates of the #DNAWorldTour2022 are on sale NOW! 🖤 https://t.co/ug8kiN1HnF https://t.co/FvKAJ2w4VY
If you don’t have your tickets yet for this Summer + Fall on the #DNAWorldTour2022 then what are you waiting for!? Get your tickets at https://t.co/QaPPK55Kqm

The last and final episode of “Making Of The DNA Tour” is out now! In a world where we don’t release VHS tapes and DVDs anymore we hope this brings back memories and gets you guys excited for what’s to come on the #DNAWorldTour2022! 🧬🖤 https://t.co/CvYxIJaqv4 https://t.co/sB97vtSDy2

Live Nation Concert Week kicks off today and runs through Tuesday May 10th. That means you can get tickets to select shows on the #DNAWorldTour2022 for a total of $25 while supplies last! Head on over to https://t.co/2s8y2griEA for details. https://t.co/g46sNpGL6e
We’ve gotten some pretty amazing works of art gifted to us over the years. Just look ☝️!! Share your creations with #BSBART and we’ll repost! https://t.co/32vUQxAOon
Lookin’ good boys 🌽
New season, new merch! Get ready for Spring BSB style with these new arrivals! ☀️ Shop here: https://t.co/NrF1NZlCPv https://t.co/xY1YCnYsYI

JUST ANNOUNCED 🚨 VIP upgrades for the North American dates of the #DNAWorldTour2022 are on sale Thursday, May 5 at 10am PST. Pre-sale for the Backstreet Army members starts Tuesday May 3 at 10am PST. Who’s coming!? 👇🏻 https://t.co/xUB4YC2mvg https://t.co/0rnZ7XCr8b

Have you ever wondered what goes into making each and every song a special moment at our shows? Head on over to our YouTube channel to check out Episode 4 of the Making Of The DNA Tour to find out! Watch at https://t.co/F5SKvfCotX! 🖤🧬 @Rich_and_Tone https://t.co/HkuuAxkJ7N

Happy Earth Day! 🌎

We are so grateful to have been given the opportunity to explore this beautiful planet and are so excited to do it again during the #DNAWorldTour2022! We ask that everyone do their part in keeping our Earth beautiful! ☀️ https://t.co/9Fhg9Wi8sF

We’re celebrating 29 years of BSB with episode 3 of our docuseries “Making Of The DNA Tour” 🧬 Tweet to unlock the episode early!! #BSB29 #DNAWorldTour2022

Well, it’s our last year in our 20’s…
Apr 20 has become such a special day over the past 29 years and we’re stronger today than we’ve ever been because you continue to show up. Though everything’s been said and done… #BSB29 

Should we plan something BIG for 30!? 😉 https://t.co/GNaQIN0geE

What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas. We loved every moment of these past two weekends. See you all on the #DNAWorldTour2022! 🧬
📸: @Dr_Dude https://t.co/vLrTFidtD6
Happy Easter everybody! 🐰 And a happy Passover to those who celebrate! https://t.co/JFj1Cly3cr

Vegas Night ✌🏻 #DNAWorldTour2022
📸: @Dr_Dude https://t.co/SJ9Nj2d2Wr

WOW. Last night we kicked off the #DNAWorldTour2022 at @ColosseumatCP at @CaesarsPalace in @VEGAS and you guys BROUGHT IT! Seeing all of your smiling faces again felt like home. 🖤 We missed you!

Can’t wait to do it again tonight and through the rest of the Summer (and Fall)!!🧬 https://t.co/WqKtBHpR4e

Today we call upon our world leaders to #StandUpForUkraine at the global humanitarian pledging summit. We’re committing to donating a portion of the proceeds from our 2022 European DNA World Tour shows to show our support. Take action at https://t.co/Fx8HCpTRdg 🇺🇦 @GlblCtzn https://t.co/eaJzp0yHJE
WE’RE BACK IN VEGAS BABY!! THE #DNAWORLDTOUR2022 KICKS OFF TONIGHT! SEE YOU SOON 🎉🧬🎰 https://t.co/DcWeuiTrnG
@ericandersonyxe @C95 @c95shauna @SaskWeekend @LeishaCBC @SaskHealth Love this! See you soon Jen 🖤

Tickets for all newly added North American & European #DNAWorldTour2022 dates are on sale now! A bunch of European dates sold out, so we added 5 new shows in Germany as well! 🧬We’re so excited to bring the show to even more of you. 🖤 Find your tickets at https://t.co/IhzJgNG8W8 https://t.co/p5JSVtt7xe

Who is coming to Vegas for our opening shows this weekend?? We put a list together of some of our favorite Vegas spots for you - check ‘em out & see you soon! Shout out @arjanwrites @AppleMusic #AppleMaps📍🖤🧬  
https://t.co/isyZSGyr48 https://t.co/rlMKubCVZd

Can’t wait to take this tour back on the road! Have you seen the first episode of our new docu-series “Making Of The DNA Tour”? It’s now up on our YouTube channel. 
🎥 @richandtone 
https://t.co/5rn5kHJrcg https://t.co/gL8o5sNA94
Don’t forget to set your alarms! ⏰ The new #DNAWorldTour2022 shows go on sale TOMORROW at 10AM local time. Let’s GO! https://t.co/wR7Soynp9D https://t.co/t4lQlFKDIB
It’s getting real!! New Vegas merch is here just in time for the Las Vegas kick-off to the DNA World Tour tomorrow! 🎉 Shop here: https://t.co/9n0VZT0Bxn https://t.co/Op7oL4xwq8
Loved every moment of this ❤️

Thanks for having us @kellyclarkson @KellyClarksonTV! We had a blast. Tickets for our newly announced North America & European shows go on sale April 8th at 10am local! #kellyclarksonshow #DNAWorldTour2022 🧬 https://t.co/xWFnTMDBYL

Fan club pre-sale starts tomorrow, April 6 at 10AM local and general on-sale starts Friday, April 8 at 10AM local. Visit https://t.co/wR7Soy5NL3 for tickets & more info! https://t.co/Mich4MCbFL

WE’RE ADDING MORE SHOWS TO THE #DNAWORLDTOUR2022 🧬 Europe, we heard you and we’re heading back your way this October & November! North America, we’re hitting 12 new cities across the US & Canada to make sure we can see as many of you as possible! https://t.co/KzeuE9pKLi
Had a blast watching Michael Jackson ONE this weekend and man did it get us HYPE to perform again!! T-minus 4 days until we kick off the DNA World Tour in Vegas! Let’s go!! https://t.co/gDEofOlGj9
New pic, new era, new surprises on the way! 👀 https://t.co/uWNrbVRsKq
Guess what! We’re going to be on the @KellyClarksonTV on April 6 to talk about a special surprise. Can you guess what it is? 👀 https://t.co/Dv0l9NeE4B
ONLY 1 WEEK until we kick off the DNA World Tour at @CaesarsPalace! Drop a gif below to show us how you're feeling!! #DNAWorldTour2022 https://t.co/j025C9DIuj

The DNA World Tour playlist is here just in time for our Vegas kick-off next week! Perfect for pre-gaming with your concert crew! Stream here! 🖤#DNAWorldTour2022
